What we are talking about?

  • transition property
  • animation property
  • keyframes property
  • transform property

Transition

div {
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
  background: red;
  padding: 10px;
}
div:hover {
  background: green;
  padding: 20px;
}

Transition

Transition

Transition parameters

.example {
  transition: 
    [transition-property:name[,...]|all|none] 
    [transition-duration:1s|0.5s|100ms] 
    [transition-timing-function:
      ease|linear|cubic-bezier|steps
      |ease-in|ease-out|ease-in-out
      |step-start|step-end]
    [transition-delay:-1s|1s|0.5s|100ms];
}
